column4: i've downloaded totem-xine now, with apt-get... how to start it?
help me please!!! in Mplayer i can't get fullscreen and in totem and don't get any picture at all!!!
yeah the window gets big but not the movie
did you try a different video clip?
and the clips work in windows
when i do that i just get the man page or something for mplayer, it doesn't start
yeah, but i thought it would start anyway... but ill try that
how can i get write access to a file?
ok, but i want to be able to e.g. change the name of my files...
now i got it working, with -zoom -x1024 -y 768
